channel.title: A game called VMK... client possible?
channel.description: I was wondering if a client is a possibility to be made for this game www.vmk.com . I think I almost got ahold of the client but i'm not sure how exactly to do it. I think i is in javascript, but like I said I am unsure. If anyone could let me know if this is possible, it would be appreciated.

item.source: A game called VMK... client possible?

item.title: A game called VMK... client possible?
item.dc:creator: @w4ffl3z w4ffl3z
item.description:
@w4ffl3z wrote:

Pwnd:

Look for .class in the page source for the game also. I was playing around, found some cheap java games and decompiled them. There was an annoying amount of stuff that I didn’t know.

I searched for .class as well. I wasn’t able to find anything except client.js. But when I looked through client.js it was just settings for the page that the client is placed in to play the game. I’ll keep looking but I am still wondering if I am able to create a client for this game if I know the address for the login and the game ip address.

Read full topic
item.source: A game called VMK... client possible?

item.title: A game called VMK... client possible?
item.dc:creator: @w4ffl3z w4ffl3z
item.description:
@w4ffl3z wrote:

Fasga:

Nowhere in the requirments does it say anything about Java. I doubt it it Java based.

I think you may be correct. The game itself seems to use more macromedia player. Is this considered not possible to create a client out of? Or is it possible still if I have the server ip its self. I don’t want to directly edit the files, I just want to make a client that would open the game outside of the internet browser.

Read full topic
